channel.title: Third Model - [All Prims This Time] Rich Nub Scim
channel.description: Removed, maybe I should stick to coding. Modeling is just not my thing.

item.title: Third Model - [All Prims This Time] Rich Nub Scim
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

My comments were constructive as they suggested you should work on making a better wireframe and blending colors better.

You should take a look at some of the better models here for examples on better wireframes and then compare it to your models. See where you can improve and etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Third Model - [All Prims This Time] Rich Nub Scim

item.title: Third Model - [All Prims This Time] Rich Nub Scim
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“dandaman1139, post:8, topic:385279”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=481036.msg3522577#msg3522577 date=1299514822]

@lilXCj if you are going to criticize/flame me, can you atleast give me suggestions, I’ve only been modeling for a few days.

He wasn’t flaming you. The criticism was constructive, as he gave a suggestion.
[/quote]

Sorry, didn’t mean it that way, I just wanted help on how to keep the wireframe clean. I know no-one can help me too much with the failed colors, but id like to know what to do about the wireframe.

Yes it was made out of a primitive shape. I wanted to have a curved blade so I had to move some vertices to do so.

Should I take a step back and make a simple weapon?[/quote]
Put the pictures back up and I will help you.

Read full topic
item.source: Third Model - [All Prims This Time] Rich Nub Scim

item.title: Third Model - [All Prims This Time] Rich Nub Scim
item.dc:creator: @dandaman1139 dandaman1139
item.description:
@dandaman1139 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:6, topic:385279”][quote author=dandaman1139 link=topic=481036.msg3522377#msg3522377 date=1299495535]
@lilXCj if you are going to criticize/flame me, can you atleast give me suggestions, I’ve only been modeling for a few days.
[/quote]
He wasn’t flaming you. The criticism was constructive, as he gave a suggestion.[/quote]

Sorry, didn’t mean it that way, I just wanted help on how to keep the wireframe clean. I know no-one can help me too much with the failed colors, but id like to know what to do about the wireframe.

Yes it was made out of a primitive shape. I wanted to have a curved blade so I had to move some vertices to do so.

Should I take a step back and make a simple weapon?

Read full topic

@lilXCj if you are going to criticize/flame me, can you atleast give me suggestions, I’ve only been modeling for a few days.

item.title: Third Model - [All Prims This Time] Rich Nub Scim
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Ok, your going down hill. I know how hard it is to get some good things together when you start, but you really just need to listen to what we say. Use 100% prims because your wireframe will be 100% cleaner and thing your design through alot more. I’m not trying to make you made either, i’m giving you a hand by telling you that. Good luck with future models, keep it up.

Read full topic

item.title: Third Model - [All Prims This Time] Rich Nub Scim
item.dc:creator: @dandaman1139 dandaman1139
item.description:
@dandaman1139 wrote:

The Arcanian:

I can say only one thing: Keep on trying.

Yeah…I took one look at and said, screw that. I really only posted it so my next one would look better! (hopefully :/)

@lilXCj if you are going to criticize/flame me, can you atleast give me suggestions, I’ve only been modeling for a few days.

Read full topic
